translation2: Thank you to everyone who supported us today! All 80 boxes of the beauty and nourishing soup have been sent out!  Materials for the beauty and nourishing soup:  * White mushroom: has the functions of sweet taste, neutral nature, tonifying lungs, stomach, kidneys, and liver, moistening the intestines, nourishing blood, strengthening the heart, tonifying yin, moistening the lungs, promoting the secretion of fluids, nourishing the bones, promoting longevity, and beautifying the skin. It can be used to treat respiratory diseases such as dry cough and asthma, women's irregular menstruation, stomach inflammation, constipation, and so on. It is a good supplement for people who are deficient in yin and heat. * Turtle shell: has a sour taste, neutral nature, tonifying the large intestine and kidneys. Its functions include harmonizing the blood, moistening the intestines, stopping diarrhea, stopping pain, and also can be used to supplement water, moisten the intestines. If you have constipation, you can eat more turtle shells. * Jujube: has a sweet taste, neutral nature, tonifying the liver and kidneys, nourishing the skin, and promoting longevity. It is suitable for those who are deficient in the liver and kidneys, anemic, and have insomnia. * Dragon eye meat: has a sweet and warm nature, tonifying the heart and spleen, suitable for those who are deficient in the heart and spleen. Dragon eye meat can also moisturize and beautify the skin, nourish and tonify the heart and spleen, promote Yang and Qi, and is suitable for anemic and insomniac people. * Lotus seeds: have a sweet and cool nature, tonifying the heart and kidneys, moistening the intestines, and promoting longevity. It can calm the mind, relieve insomnia, tonify the heart and kidneys, nourish the blood, and moisten the intestines. It is suitable for those who are deficient in the heart and kidneys, have heart palpitations, forgetfulness, and insomnia.  Therefore, this beauty and nourishing soup is not only a sweet dish, but also a health food that can nourish the body! Eating more of it can make you feel calm and healthy! And it won't be as expensive as bird's nest, and eating more won't empty your wallet!

translation2: Today, let's take a look at some [strange searches]. What is normal public opinion? Randomly select three hot searches: February 2nd Lunar New Year, the rise of good friends, and the commodity price event. Public opinion spreads and forms a wave, then [decreases exponentially] (smooth curve) eventually dissipates. If secondary public opinion is generated, there may be a small peak reappear. They look exactly the same as the [network public opinion evolution model] displayed on the official website of the network administration bureau.  What is abnormal public opinion? Randomly select six hot searches from the same event and present [isolated peaks], [jagged peaks], and [cliff-like peaks]. [Isolated peaks] refer to human-induced heating, quickly rising to the top of the hot search list and attracting public attention; [jagged peaks] refer to periodic heating, ensuring that the topic stays on the hot search list; [cliff-like peaks] refer to collective withdrawal, the hot search having fulfilled its "function", being assigned to a new task, and moving to a new battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of one event's hotness is exactly the trough of another event's hotness, and the time difference is only a few seconds, which must be due to a coordinated attack by the water army, launching a new round of offensives.  The professionalization of black public relations can be seen: several hot searches are simultaneously on the podium, which ones attract attention, which ones are responsible for publicity, which ones create warfare, which ones divert the line of sight, which ones influence cognition, which ones mislead judgment, which ones incite emotions, which ones manipulate decision-making, which ones are bundled with judgments, and which ones are refined in terms of nodes and batches. Almost all factors of public opinion dissemination are considered.  Dissemination is a science, discarding subjective factors such as standpoints and emotions, and only from objective data, black public relations also has no place to hide. Every step leaves a trace, and these traces, we dig them out together.  Data source: hot search time machine.

However, overall, the message of the text is understandable, the vocabulary is used appropriately, and the syntax is mostly conventional." } }

translation2: Is a foot bath with bubbles and tingling feet a sign of leakage? Choosing an appropriate foot bath can bring good therapeutic effects, and today's US small editors will answer this question for you. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, foot baths have become increasingly popular among consumers, and a variety of products with different specifications have emerged on the market, ranging from hundreds of yuan to thousands of yuan, providing consumers with a wide range of choices. According to relevant data, foot baths and traditional household electrical appliances sell well, but foot baths do not have their own industry standards, so there are certain safety risks. "It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water!" Mr. Li told the reporter. Recently, he bought a foot bath as a gift for his father's birthday, but when his father soaked his feet, he felt tingling in his soles. Mr. Li initially thought it was caused by the vibration function of the foot bath, but after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt tingling in his soles. Mr. Li tried writing with a pen, and surprisingly, the pen lit up. Mr. Li discovered that the water in the foot bath was electrified. Later, he contacted the store, and the store's attitude was not bad, although he returned the foot bath, Mr. Li still felt unhappy. Because he found that there was no clear and detailed industry regulation on issues such as whether it can be used at the highest temperature, which groups of people it is suitable for, what materials are guaranteed to be safe, and so on. However, in general, foot baths do not have electrical problems, but it is not ruled out that some products may have been produced without strict quality control during the manufacturing process. Therefore, when purchasing, choose a disassembled foot bath. Water and electricity are separated, and there are no safety risks. You can also test with a pen at will.

translation2: Education News: The proportion of gifted students in Beijing's 2016 middle school entrance examination was reduced - Xinhua Net. On May 21st and 22nd, the work of the middle school entrance examination for gifted students in Beijing was organized by each district education committee. This year, the admission ratio of gifted students in Beijing's various districts has been reduced, and the competition among gifted students has become more intense. For example, in Dongcheng District, the proportion of elementary school students who were admitted to middle school as gifted students this year did not exceed 5% of the total planned enrollment of the district, with a planned enrollment of 380 people. The admission rate of students to schools did not exceed 10% of the school's planned enrollment. Students with special talents in sports, art, and science who have registered online are eligible to participate in the gifted student admission examination. In order to facilitate students' nearby participation in the examination, the admission arrangement of Dongcheng District is continued from last year, with 1 to 2 examination sites set up in each district, a total of 13 examination sites. The examination sites are divided into different examination areas according to the examination time, and students will enter the examination area in different examination areas according to the examination time on the examination day. On May 23rd, the list of students who passed the examination will be announced on the website of the district education examination center. Students can query the examination results online.

translation2: The Yangtze River's upstream green integrated service area has been fully covered - Xinhua Net, December 11, 2021 (reporter Wang Xian) The Changjiang River upstream green integrated service area in Chongqing was officially put into operation on December 10, following the opening of the downstream water-based green integrated service area in Yibin, Sichuan Province. This is the second water-based green integrated service area on the Yangtze River upstream after the Yibin area was officially put into operation. With this, the water-based green integrated service area has covered the entire upstream, middle, and downstream of the Yangtze River.  The Transportation Department's Changjiang River Navigation Management Bureau's deputy director, Qiu Jianhua, introduced that before, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui, and Jiangsu had built and put into operation 10 water-based green integrated service areas on the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River, which were well received by the majority of ship crews and played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River shipping.  The full coverage of the water-based green integrated service area is another milestone event in the construction of green Yangtze River shipping, and the reception and handling of ship pollutants and the service capacity of shipping have been significantly improved. It is introduced that the water-based green integrated service area is an important facility for providing comprehensive production and living services for the majority of ships and ship crews, helping them solve the "urgent, difficult, and worried" problems.  This time, the two water-based green integrated service areas on the upstream Yangtze River were officially put into operation, integrating living services, production services, and public services, with environmental protection as the main theme and ship maintenance and emergency rescue services as the highlight. They can provide "one-stop berthing and multiple services" for inland ships, making the work of ship crews more efficient and their lives more convenient.

translation2: What is the correct way to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky? Everyone has different preferences, some people like to collect, some like to eat delicious food, of course, there are also people who like to drink wine, Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the best-selling Scottish whiskies in various countries, and it has also won the gold medal at the International Spirits Competition. Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label has a unique flavor, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, wouldn't that be a waste of its fragrant aroma? So, how should Johnnie Walker Red Label be drunk? Our editor will introduce it to you in a simple way.  Johnnie Walker Red Label drinking method: Johnnie Walker Red Label is made from about 35 types of Scottish whiskies and has a strong aroma and traditional characteristics of Scottish whiskies, with a sweet and smoky flavor. The taste is smooth and refreshing, with a slight taste of grass and a strong smoky flavor of malt. This whisky can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drink.  After entering the Chinese market, to suit the taste of the Chinese people, Johnnie Walker Red Label + Coca-Cola or Sprite or New Coke became a popular and enduring fashion. These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the acidity, but also give people a pleasant visual experience, and adding them to the drink can have a refreshing effect on the taste.  Johnnie Walker Red Label + sliced lemon + sugar (sand sugar can also be used), is the most traditional and authentic way to drink. The traditional taste of Johnnie Walker Red Label is slightly bitter, adding sugar can balance the bitterness, and lemon will bring a refreshing aroma to the whisky, of course, the sweetness can be adjusted according to personal preferences.  The above three are the best ways to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label, and everyone can try them as references. We hope that our introduction can be helpful to everyone.

translation2: Saudi Arabia's First Contemporary Art Biennial Exhibition Held in Riyadh - Xinhua Net  RIYADH, Dec. 12 (Xinhua) -- The first biennial exhibition of contemporary art in Saudi Arabia was officially opened to the public on December 11 in the art district of JAX in the northwest of the capital Riyadh. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China, and other countries participated in the exhibition.  The biennial exhibition was jointly planned by the Saudi Diriyah Biennial Foundation and the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in Beijing, China. UCCA Center for Contemporary Art Director Tian Weidong served as the art director of the exhibition.  According to the curatorial team, the theme of this biennial exhibition is "Touching Stones to Cross the River," which represents the reform strategies adopted during the period of social economic transformation and also reflects the current situation of cultural development in Saudi society.  The exhibition covers an area of nearly 12,000 square meters and is divided into six interconnected buildings, presenting six units: "Touching Stones to Cross the River," "Inheritance as Experiment," "Edge Thinking," "Towards the Public," "Beautiful New World," and "On the Spirit of Art." Among them, the works of 27 Saudi artists account for more than 40% of the total number of exhibits, covering painting, installation art, and performance art, among others. Twelve Chinese artists' works are also highly anticipated, some of whom use innovative ways to create art using recycled materials, such as Xu Bing's "Behind the Story Series: The Endless Mountains of the River" (2014), which reconstructs a classic landscape painting using discarded materials.  The CEO of the Diriyah Biennial Foundation, Bakkili, said that he hoped that this biennial exhibition could establish an international dialogue and allow audiences around the world to understand the vibrant cultural industry and creative communities in Saudi Arabia. Tian Weidong said, "The goal of the biennial exhibition is double-edged, enabling Saudi contemporary art to participate in the global conversation and allowing Saudi audiences to immerse themselves in the world of contemporary art."  During the opening week of the biennial exhibition, a series of lectures will be held, and experts, curators, and opinion leaders in the art and creative industries will discuss topics such as cross-cultural exchange and the development of contemporary art.

translation2: In September 2020, Mr. Liu learned about a factory building located in Yongjia Zhujing Town, Zhejiang, from his real estate agent. After visiting the site multiple times, Mr. Liu decided to purchase the factory. In December of the same year, Mr. Liu negotiated the details of the purchase with the owner's family member, Ms. Lin, and transferred 200,000 yuan as a deposit by wire transfer on the same day. Ms. Lin signed the "Factory Purchase and Sale Deposit Receipt" as the payee, stipulating that if the buyer did not want to purchase the factory, the deposit would be returned to the seller, and if the seller did not want to sell the factory, the deposit would be doubled and returned to the buyer. However, due to differences in the scope of the factory's sale and payment methods, the two parties were unable to reach a consensus on the main terms of the contract, causing the formal contract to be delayed.  Considering that the two parties were unable to reach a consensus on the contract terms, Ms. Lin refunded the 200,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Liu a few days later. Mr. Liu was disappointed and angry that he had almost bought the house, paid the deposit, and was ready to sign the contract, only to find that the seller did not sell it.  Therefore, Mr. Liu sued Ms. Lin in the Yongjia People's Court. The court held that since the two parties were unable to reach a consensus on the contract terms, it could not be solely attributed to the defendant, and it was reasonable to infer that the negotiation failed. Therefore, this case should not apply the penalty for the deposit, and the defendant is not required to bear the responsibility of returning double the deposit to the plaintiff.  After the first instance ruling, the plaintiff appealed. Recently, the second instance court upheld the original judgment.  【Legal Reminder】In the transaction process, it is necessary to fulfill the necessary due diligence. When signing a contract, as the buyer, it is necessary to fulfill the necessary due diligence, such as verifying the information of the property owner, whether the property has been occupied by others, and stipulating the specific time and place of delivery in the contract to avoid disputes between the parties when performing the contract.

translation2: Translation:  Golden Madame Wedding Photography (South Street Store) currently does not have a branch. Before the photo shoot, we did not have a scheduled time, so we had to change it twice. Our consultant, Lan Lan, was very patient in helping us arrange the time. Later, we chose a weekend with good weather to take the photos. Golden Madame's staff, including the consultant, makeup artist, and photographer, were all praised. It was my first time having a professional makeup done, and I was amazed at how good I looked. Shao Jie and another sister (I'm sorry, I don't remember her name) did a great job with the makeup, and it was very natural. The outdoor photos were taken at Jiangwan City. Fortunately, the weather was good that day, and I didn't feel too cold. During the photo shoot, the makeup artist occasionally paid attention to our clothes and accessories and quickly arranged them if they looked a little messy. The photographer was also very funny and made us feel happy throughout the day. When we chose the photos, we didn't want to delete too many photos online, but when we chose the photos, we didn't add any extra ones. We just took the 24 photos in the package, and none of them were added (I heard that my cousin who took a similar amount of time to take wedding photos with Golden Madame added over 10,000 extra photos, and I was shocked at the time. I was also afraid that I would choose too many). Today, the photos have been edited, and Lan Lan sent them to me. I looked at two that I didn't like, and they immediately helped me re-edit them. When I compared the photos of my sister-in-law who had taken photos before, I felt that our photos were much more satisfactory. They were simple and fresh, just the style I wanted. I sincerely recommend everyone to go to Golden Madame to take wedding photos! Package price: 3999 yuan. Golden Madame, thank you for your help, and I wish you all the happiness and prosperity in the world! How much is this package?

"The Light Under the Lamp" is his other name, also known as "Chinese Abnormal Records," and "the suspense and strange talent" Sheep Walking will take you deep into the marrow of Chinese folk customs with his all-new work "The Light Under the Lamp." What kind of touching, moving love and hatred lies behind those legends that have been passed down to the present day? translation2: Restaurant Review: Jiangchang Restaurant (Wudu Branch)  Environment: Medium-sized and well-structured.  Service: Quick service.  Recommended dishes: "Ancient Method Mala Cake" is a must-try dish. The cake is very fragrant, soft, and delicious. If you like desserts, you must try "Dongjiang Ink Fish and Tofu Porridge". The soup is very flavorful, the tofu is very fresh, and the... The taste of the meat dishes is also very good. The service is enthusiastic.  It's been a long time since I've been to Jiangchang Restaurant. The fruit platter is still as good as I remember. The first time I tried the steamed bun, it had the southern softness and flavor that I love! The porridge is just right in terms of dryness and moisture, and the portion is very generous. The signature Siyi chicken wings are still as good as ever, and the soup is also not bad. The garlic is processed quite well... The taste is very good, and the service is enthusiastic. The meat dishes are also very good.  Jiangchang Restaurant used to be a popular online presence a long time ago, located in Dongdan, with wooden floors. There's always a long wait at the entrance, and the clay pot rice always takes a long time to cook... I haven't been to Jiangchang Restaurant for a few years, and there are now many small shops offering Cantonese cuisine, which has dispersed the customer flow. It's rare to be able to get a seat right away, and the quality of the dishes is still as good as ever.  The taste is very good, and the meat dishes are particularly recommended. Jiangchang Restaurant has been around for a long time and is a well-known establishment. However, with the rise of various small shops offering Cantonese cuisine, the popularity of Jiangchang Restaurant has diminished.  Jiangchang Restaurant offers takeout service.  Food: The dishes this time were a bit disappointing. The three-cup chicken had a bit too much vegetables and not enough chicken meat. The main seasoning was a bit off, with a lack of salty flavor, which made the sweetness more prominent. Everyone can try adding some sweetness and various seasonings to balance the dish.  Overall, Jiangchang Restaurant is still a good choice for Cantonese cuisine, but it's not as popular as it used to be.

translation2: 大美360集成家装 地址：环城南路156号幸福家园12楼 一开始是朋友介绍的因为信任，所以选择来看一下起初我的预算是7万做个基本装修。 来到店里就开始一系列的骗术。 我是第一次到店只是给他们看了我的户型图，他们并没有去实地量过房子，他们居然就能给我报价说我的135的房子7万是可以搞定的，大概的给我看了一下他们的材料也并不知道他们是什么品牌的材料。 他们的第二套骗术就是你只要到店就会拖着你把定金交了（而这个钱一旦交了你是永远退不出来，除非你有足够的经历和他们打理论战）。 我在犹豫要不要交定金的时候，他们就会邀请他们所谓的经理来告诉你，你今天只要把定金交了我们就能给你多少的优惠。 这个就是一个大坑，我就是活生生被骗的例子，在头脑冲动的时候，交了一万多的定金。 他给我的报价有很多问题7万不包括水电改造，不包括任何门和橱柜 浴室，而这三个就是基装的费用大头。 除去这些他们的服务点费收的也比其他家公司的高。 我对这个公司失去了信任，一开始什么都没有讲清楚就让我签合同。 当我去找他们退钱的时候他们表现出很有经验的样子，有专门的小团队来对付你。 无论如何都会一口咬死是客户的问题他们全然无责。 各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。 坑爹，他们就是原来骗人的龙头装饰，现在改成大美，好像又倒闭了又改成其他的。 所以大家别选择这样坑爹的装修公司。 以后大家在选择的时候多百度看看这些查一下这些咨询因为装修不是小钱。 想要向商家提问，请先登录或注册 严禁发布各种形式的商家点评，详细请见商户收录声明 大众点评昆明装修设计频道为您提供

translation2: The 13th Provincial Tea Expo Opens - Headline News - Hunan Daily Network - China Sound Online - Hunan Daily December 10, 2022 (Full Media Reporters: Zhang Shanwu, Hu Minmin, Correspondent: Liu Xiaoling, Photography: Li Jian) This morning, the 13th Hunan Tea Industry Expo and the New Hope Red Tea Promotion Conference was held in the Hunan International Convention and Exhibition Center, showcasing the tea industry, innovating tea technology, promoting tea culture, and accelerating the goal of a trillion-yuan tea industry. The Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives, He Xunli, and the Vice Chairman of the Hunan Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Ye Hong, attended the opening ceremony. Academician Lou Zhonghua, a member of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, solemnly introduced the red tea source in New Hope and the rise of red tea as the new impetus for "Five Colors of Xiang Tea" during the opening ceremony. In recent years, the provincial committee and provincial government have strongly supported the development of the tea industry and promoted the construction of a trillion-yuan tea industry in Hunan, forming a development pattern of "Three Xiangs, Four Waters, and Five Colors of Tea". Tea industries in the province have increased innovation, with green tea, black tea, and red tea as the main force, promoting the integration of tea tourism in the main tea-producing areas, driving tea farmers to increase income. The wind turns, and red tea is on the rise again. Tea industry experts in the province said that after completing green tea and black tea, tea farmers have income all year round, and the output value of tea gardens continues to rise. At the opening ceremony, provincial leaders awarded the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use the "Hunan Red Tea" trademark, and New Hope welcomed the "source of Hunan Red Tea". In the New Hope Red Tea Exhibition Hall, tea merchants from Fujian were impressed by a high-mountain tea named "Ice Spring" and immediately placed an order. The Secretary-General of the Hunan Tea Industry Association, Wang Zhen, said happily that the epidemic and other factors may have affected the tea leaf market to some extent, but from the scene of the tea expo, the highlights were abundant. The red tea of New Hope injected the cultural connotation of tea, and the popularity and trading were hot, welcoming a new spring for the Hunan tea industry.

translation2: According to a recent report from the Xinhua News Agency, the Jiangxi Province will train 10,000 rural elementary school music, art, and physical education teachers within the next three years to strengthen the teacher team and promote balanced development of rural compulsory education. Starting from 2016, Jiangxi Province plans to train one music, art, and physical education teacher for each rural elementary school (village and below) in the province within three years, with a total of 10,000 trained teachers. The training targets individuals in Jiangxi Province's rural elementary schools who are under 45 years old and have music, art, or physical education knowledge or skills, and can teach other subjects. Through the training, they will acquire basic knowledge and teaching skills in music, art, and physical education, update their teaching ideas and concepts, and learn modern teaching methods to improve their subject teaching ability, activity design ability, campus culture ability, and self-development ability. The training aims to build a team of multi-skilled music, art, and physical education teachers to alleviate the shortage of rural music, art, and physical education teachers. To ensure the quality and effectiveness of the training, Jiangxi Province also plans to train one music, art, and physical education teacher for each of the 100 county (city, district) elementary schools in the province, with a total of 300 trainees, to enhance their teaching demonstration leadership ability, teaching research activity design ability, teaching implementation ability, and network training workshop construction ability, and play the roles of teaching, demonstrating, guiding, and supervising.

translation2: According to a report from the Xinhua News Agency on December 11, 2022, the number of graduates from universities in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022, an increase of 16,000 compared to the previous year. At the 2022 Beijing Graduate Employment and Entrepreneurship Work Video Conference held by the Beijing Municipal Committee of Education and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau, relevant personnel from the two departments announced the deployment of employment work for Beijing university graduates.  The personnel from the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they would strengthen the matching of supply and demand, enhance policy support, broaden employment channels, ensure assistance for difficult cases, support innovation and entrepreneurship, and improve service efficiency in various aspects to deploy the employment work for Beijing university graduates.  The reporter learned that the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau would establish a practical platform, increase the number of job positions, actively contact 40 university graduate career experience bases, visit user units, and integrate demand and position information. They would focus on expanding the recruitment of the "six groups", including expanding the recruitment of civil service units, expanding the recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expanding the recruitment of grassroots projects, expanding the recruitment of military service, expanding the recruitment of internships and part-time jobs, and expanding the recruitment of innovation and entrepreneurship. They would implement dynamic management with "one policy for a lifetime" and recommend at least 5 job position information for each graduate, ensuring that all graduates with employment intentions receive assistance.

translation2: Thank you to everyone who supported us today! All 80 boxes of the beauty and nourishing soup have been sent out!  Materials for the beauty and nourishing soup:  * White mushroom: has the functions of sweet taste, neutral nature, tonifying lungs, stomach, kidneys, and liver, moistening the intestines, nourishing blood, strengthening the heart, tonifying yin, moistening the lungs, promoting the secretion of fluids, nourishing the bones, promoting longevity, and beautifying the skin. It can be used to treat respiratory diseases such as dry cough and asthma, women's irregular menstruation, stomach inflammation, constipation, and so on. It is a good supplement for people who are deficient in yin and heat. * Turtle shell: has a sour taste, neutral nature, tonifying the large intestine and kidneys. Its functions include harmonizing the blood, moistening the intestines, stopping diarrhea, stopping pain, and also can be used to supplement water, moisten the intestines. If you have constipation, you can eat more turtle shells. * Jujube: has a sweet taste, neutral nature, tonifying the liver and kidneys, nourishing the skin, and promoting longevity. It is suitable for those who are deficient in the liver and kidneys, anemic, and have insomnia. * Dragon eye meat: has a sweet and warm nature, tonifying the heart and spleen, suitable for those who are deficient in the heart and spleen. Dragon eye meat can also moisturize and beautify the skin, nourish and tonify the heart and spleen, promote Yang and Qi, and is suitable for anemic and insomniac people. * Lotus seeds: have a sweet and cool nature, tonifying the heart and kidneys, moistening the intestines, and promoting longevity. It can calm the mind, relieve insomnia, tonify the heart and kidneys, nourish the blood, and moisten the intestines. It is suitable for those who are deficient in the heart and kidneys, have heart palpitations, forgetfulness, and insomnia.  Therefore, this beauty and nourishing soup is not only a sweet dish, but also a health food that can nourish the body! Eating more of it can make you feel calm and healthy! And it won't be as expensive as bird's nest, and eating more won't empty your wallet!

translation2: The State Council Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism recently issued a notice on strengthening the epidemic prevention and control work at land port cities. The notice requires that individuals who have been out of the country for more than 48 hours and are planning to enter land port cities (excluding those with land port cities bordering Hong Kong and Macao) must provide a negative nucleic acid test result within the past 48 hours. After arriving at the land port city, they must undergo at least one nucleic acid test. The time range for the above requirements is from the date when each province, autonomous region, or municipality determines the scope of land port cities and announces it to March 15, 2022. In addition, the notice also proposes that qualified land port cities can set up buffer zones for epidemic prevention and control within their jurisdiction.  According to the notice, for some land port cities, cross-border trade is the main pillar of the local economy, and there is frequent cross-border traffic between the two sides. Implementing differential management policies can turn one line of defense into two lines of defense, which may achieve the goal of reducing the risk of the epidemic spreading across the border and minimizing the social impact and cost of epidemic prevention and control.  Recently, China has experienced several local outbreaks of the epidemic, all of which were imported from overseas through land port cities. The notice pointed out that this exposed some problems such as delayed epidemic monitoring and early warning, inadequate management of high-risk personnel, insufficient implementation of regular nucleic acid testing, poor management of cold chain logistics, irregular management of centralized isolation facilities, and insufficient scientific and accurate handling of epidemic emergencies.  The notice requires that efforts should be made from nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism at land port cities, strengthening the epidemic monitoring and early warning system, implementing border control measures, etc., to fill in the gaps in land port city epidemic prevention and control, and do a good job of epidemic prevention and control work, tightening the defense line against the import of the epidemic.  The notice emphasizes that land port cities should integrate epidemic prevention and control with the guarantee of people's livelihood, and study and deploy it in parallel with the people's livelihood guarantee work. The hotline for people's livelihood guarantee should be published and communicated in a timely manner, and problems in the supply of basic necessities such as food and prices should be regularly checked and solved.  According to the notice, the land port cities referred to include the counties (cities, districts, and autonomous regions), prefecture-level cities, and directly-administered municipalities where land ports are located, as well as the cities, autonomous regions, and municipalities where they are located. The specific scope is to be determined by each province (autonomous region, municipality) according to the needs of epidemic prevention and control and announced in a timely manner.

translation2: Chinese to English Translation:  A coalition of Asian-American groups filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, alleging that three Ivy League schools, including Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College, discriminated against Asian-American applicants in the admissions process. Over 100 Asian-American groups submitted the complaint on May 23, protesting the discrimination against Asian-American applicants by these three Ivy League schools. The Asian American Education Foundation held a press conference in Washington on the same day to announce the lawsuit. The president of the coalition, Zhao Yuchun, said at the press conference that the number of Asian-American applicants who meet the admission criteria of these three Ivy League schools has increased tenfold in the past 10 years, but the proportion of Asian-Americans admitted has remained basically unchanged. Many studies have shown that these schools systematically and continuously discriminate against Asian-American applicants in the "holistic consideration" admission process. Zhao Yuchun introduced that a study by Sanders et al. in 2014 showed that among these three schools, the relative number of Asian-American applicants was the lowest among all ethnic groups, and the admission rate was the lowest. The data of the U.S. Department of Education also shows that among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rate for Asian-American students, and Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian-American applicants for over 20 years. Zhao Yuchun told a reporter from Xinhua News Agency that they hope to submit the complaint and request the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department to investigate and take action to stop these schools from continuing to discriminate against Asian-American applicants in the admissions process. They also hope that the schools involved in the lawsuit will take this issue seriously and change their admission policies towards Asian-Americans. The three schools involved in the lawsuit have not yet responded. The Asian American Education Foundation was established in 2015 and previously filed a complaint against Harvard University's admission discrimination against Asian-Americans, but the U.S. Department of Education did not process the complaint for procedural reasons. This time, in addition to the Chinese-American groups, Indian-American, Japanese-American, Korean-American, and Pakistani-American education groups also participated in the lawsuit.

translation2: The joint exercise "Peaceful Relief-2021" between the armed forces of China and Vietnam has been successfully concluded. All participating Chinese teams have safely returned to China's Guangxi territory, marking the completion of a seven-day training mission.  During this joint exercise, the armed forces of China and Vietnam focused on the topic of humanitarian medical relief and tightly adhered to the mission of emergency aid and disaster relief. They completed joint emergency command, joint on-site rescue, and mass treatment of casualties, among other topics, in accordance with practical standards, effectively enhancing the ability of both sides to provide emergency aid.  The results of the exercise have been recognized by both sides. The chairman of the exercise directing committee of the Vietnamese side, Nguyen Xuan Phuc, said at the closing ceremony that Vietnamese military doctors have learned about the organization and professional activities of the exercise from Chinese military doctors, as well as about China's medical and support equipment. The results of the exercise prove the professional capabilities of the military medical forces of both countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention.  The chairman of the Chinese guidance and coordination group, Chen Chunming, deputy director of the Logistics Department of the Central Military Commission, said that this exercise is another innovative practice based on the successful joint medical examination in 2018, with very important milestone significance.  During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing instruments to the Vietnamese People's Army.
